sentence.Network_en: His hair was disheveled, and his face was unshaven and gray.
sentence.Network_cn: 他头发凌乱，没刮胡子，脸色苍白。

sentence.Network_en: He arrived, somewhat rumpled and unshaven.
sentence.Network_cn: 他到了，有点衣冠不整，胡子也没有刮。

sentence.Network_en: He looked unshaven, shabby, and down-and-out.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看上去胡子拉碴、衣衫褴褛、穷困潦倒。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 自考英语阅读词汇表3... ... twilight n. 黄昏，暮色 unshaven a. 不剃须的 venom n. 恶意；（毒蛇等的）毒液.
unshaven是什么意思|unshaven的中文意思... ... unshaven ： 未剃胡子的 unshaven ： 未剃须的 unshaven adj ： 未剃胡子的.
He looked pale and unshaven ., 他看上去脸色苍白 , 胡子拉碴.
每日雅思词汇：形形色色的"胡子"_新东方网 ... clean-shaven 胡子刮得很干净的; unshaven 胡子拉渣的; sideburns 鬓角两侧的胡子.

list.abs: His hair was very short but his cheeks were unshaven ., 他头发很短 , 没有刮脸.

entry.tran: 没刮胡子的；未刮过脸的
entry.def: If a man is unshaven, he has not shaved recently and there are short hairs on his face or chin.

example.ex: His hair was disheveled, and his face was unshaven and gray.
example.tran: 他头发凌乱，没刮胡子，脸色苍白。

auth_sentence.content: The man, unshaven and wretched-looking, began to cry.
auth_sentence.res_content: The man, unshaven and wretched-looking, began to cry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The man, unshaven and wretched-looking, began to cry.

auth_sentence.content: Patches of unshaven bristle on his jowls.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Patches of unshaven bristle on his jowls.

auth_sentence.content: The light cast a yellow pall on Lobello's unshaven face.
auth_sentence.res_content: The light cast a yellow pall on Lobello's unshaven face.
